description: Box plot of median ambulance response times by SEIFA decile at the LGA level.

transform.expr: (datum['90th Percentile'] < datum['lower_box_90th Percentile'] - 1.5 * (datum['upper_box_90th Percentile'] - datum['lower_box_90th Percentile'])) || (datum['90th Percentile'] > datum['upper_box_90th Percentile'] + 1.5 * (datum['upper_box_90th Percentile'] - datum['lower_box_90th Percentile']))

datum["SEIFA Decile"]==="2" ? 0 : datum["SEIFA Decile"]==="3" ? 1 : datum["SEIFA Decile"]==="4" ? 2 : datum["SEIFA Decile"]==="5" ? 3 : datum["SEIFA Decile"]==="6" ? 4 : datum["SEIFA Decile"]==="7" ? 5 : datum["SEIFA Decile"]==="8" ? 6 : datum["SEIFA Decile"]==="9" ? 7 : datum["SEIFA Decile"]==="10" ? 8 : 9

(datum['lower_box_90th Percentile'] - 1.5 * (datum['upper_box_90th Percentile'] - datum['lower_box_90th Percentile']) <= datum['90th Percentile']) && (datum['90th Percentile'] <= datum['upper_box_90th Percentile'] + 1.5 * (datum['upper_box_90th Percentile'] - datum['lower_box_90th Percentile']))

datum["SEIFA Decile"]==="2" ? 0 : datum["SEIFA Decile"]==="3" ? 1 : datum["SEIFA Decile"]==="4" ? 2 : datum["SEIFA Decile"]==="5" ? 3 : datum["SEIFA Decile"]==="6" ? 4 : datum["SEIFA Decile"]==="7" ? 5 : datum["SEIFA Decile"]==="8" ? 6 : datum["SEIFA Decile"]==="9" ? 7 : datum["SEIFA Decile"]==="10" ? 8 : 9

datum["SEIFA Decile"]==="2" ? 0 : datum["SEIFA Decile"]==="3" ? 1 : datum["SEIFA Decile"]==="4" ? 2 : datum["SEIFA Decile"]==="5" ? 3 : datum["SEIFA Decile"]==="6" ? 4 : datum["SEIFA Decile"]==="7" ? 5 : datum["SEIFA Decile"]==="8" ? 6 : datum["SEIFA Decile"]==="9" ? 7 : datum["SEIFA Decile"]==="10" ? 8 : 9

datum["SEIFA Decile"]==="2" ? 0 : datum["SEIFA Decile"]==="3" ? 1 : datum["SEIFA Decile"]==="4" ? 2 : datum["SEIFA Decile"]==="5" ? 3 : datum["SEIFA Decile"]==="6" ? 4 : datum["SEIFA Decile"]==="7" ? 5 : datum["SEIFA Decile"]==="8" ? 6 : datum["SEIFA Decile"]==="9" ? 7 : datum["SEIFA Decile"]==="10" ? 8 : 9

datum["SEIFA Decile"]==="2" ? 0 : datum["SEIFA Decile"]==="3" ? 1 : datum["SEIFA Decile"]==="4" ? 2 : datum["SEIFA Decile"]==="5" ? 3 : datum["SEIFA Decile"]==="6" ? 4 : datum["SEIFA Decile"]==="7" ? 5 : datum["SEIFA Decile"]==="8" ? 6 : datum["SEIFA Decile"]==="9" ? 7 : datum["SEIFA Decile"]==="10" ? 8 : 9

description.signal: "SEIFA Decile: " + (isValid(datum["SEIFA Decile"]) ? datum["SEIFA Decile"] : ""+datum["SEIFA Decile"]) + "; Response Time (min): " + (format(datum["90th Percentile"], ""))

tooltip.signal: {"Upper Whisker of Response Time (min)": format(datum["upper_whisker_90th Percentile"], ""), "Lower Whisker of Response Time (min)": format(datum["lower_whisker_90th Percentile"], ""), "SEIFA Decile": isValid(datum["SEIFA Decile"]) ? datum["SEIFA Decile"] : ""+datum["SEIFA Decile"]}

{"Upper Whisker of Response Time (min)": format(datum["upper_whisker_90th Percentile"], ""), "Lower Whisker of Response Time (min)": format(datum["lower_whisker_90th Percentile"], ""), "SEIFA Decile": isValid(datum["SEIFA Decile"]) ? datum["SEIFA Decile"] : ""+datum["SEIFA Decile"]}

{"Max of Response Time (min)": format(datum["max_90th Percentile"], ""), "Q3 of Response Time (min)": format(datum["upper_box_90th Percentile"], ""), "Median of Response Time (min)": format(datum["mid_box_90th Percentile"], ""), "Q1 of Response Time (min)": format(datum["lower_box_90th Percentile"], ""), "Min of Response Time (min)": format(datum["min_90th Percentile"], ""), "SEIFA Decile": isValid(datum["SEIFA Decile"]) ? datum["SEIFA Decile"] : ""+datum["SEIFA Decile"]}

description.signal: "SEIFA Decile: " + (isValid(datum["SEIFA Decile"]) ? datum["SEIFA Decile"] : ""+datum["SEIFA Decile"]) + "; Response Time (min): " + (format(datum["lower_box_90th Percentile"], "")) + "; upper_box_90th Percentile: " + (format(datum["upper_box_90th Percentile"], "")) + "; Max of Response Time (min): " + (format(datum["max_90th Percentile"], "")) + "; Q3 of Response Time (min): " + (format(datum["upper_box_90th Percentile"], "")) + "; Median of Response Time (min): " + (format(datum["mid_box_90th Percentile"], "")) + "; Q1 of Response Time (min): " + (format(datum["lower_box_90th Percentile"], "")) + "; Min of Response Time (min): " + (format(datum["min_90th Percentile"], ""))

tooltip.signal: {"Max of Response Time (min)": format(datum["max_90th Percentile"], ""), "Q3 of Response Time (min)": format(datum["upper_box_90th Percentile"], ""), "Median of Response Time (min)": format(datum["mid_box_90th Percentile"], ""), "Q1 of Response Time (min)": format(datum["lower_box_90th Percentile"], ""), "Min of Response Time (min)": format(datum["min_90th Percentile"], ""), "SEIFA Decile": isValid(datum["SEIFA Decile"]) ? datum["SEIFA Decile"] : ""+datum["SEIFA Decile"]}
